entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
